$id: AL-Go for GitHub Repo Settings File
title: AL-Go for GitHub Repo Settings File
description: schema for AL-Go for GitHub Repo Settings File

type.description: Specifies the type of project. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#type

templateUrl.description: URL to the GitHub repository template for this repository. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#templateUrl

runs-on.description: Specifies which GitHub runner is used to run non-build jobs. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#runs-on

shell.description: Specifies the shell to use for non-build jobs. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#shell

githubRunner.description: Specifies which GitHub runner is used to run build jobs. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#githubRunner

githubRunnerShell.description: Specifies the shell to use for build jobs. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#githubRunnerShell

useProjectDependencies.description: Specifies whether the project dependencies should be used to setup multi-stage build jobs. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#useProjectDependencies

currentSchedule.description: Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds. Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#currentSchedule

nextMinorSchedule.description: Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds. Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#nextMinorSchedule

nextMajorSchedule.description: Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds. Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/AL-Go-Settings#nextMajorSchedule
